verses.name: Proverbs 19:1
verses.text: Better is the poor that walketh in his integrity, than he that is perverse in his lips, and is a fool.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:2
verses.text: Also, that the soul be without knowledge, it is not good; and he that hasteth with his feet sinneth.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:3
verses.text: The foolishness of man perverteth his way: and his heart fretteth against the Lord.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:4
verses.text: Wealth maketh many friends; but the poor is separated from his neighbour.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:5
verses.text: A false witness shall not be unpunished, and he that speaketh lies shall not escape.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:6
verses.text: Many will intreat the favour of the prince: and every man is a friend to him that giveth gifts.
